title: Arden Beauty By Elizabeth Arden For Women. Eau De Parfum Spray 3.3 Ounces
description: Introduced in 2002. Fragrance notes: a floral bouquet, very feminine. Recommended use: daytime.When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you.  For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear.  Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied
